reviewText:
Although Andrea McNichol is a bit dramatic (annoying) in her presentation style the information she shares is INVALUABLE. I have used this knowledge to:  assess new employees, discover more about myself and others and help clients reach their personal and professional goals.

Since it is our brain that writes: you can intentionally change your writing thus influencing how your brain operates. For instance: if you want a stronger work drive you can modify how and where you cross your T t 's, etc. A powerful tool for growth!

If she weren't so annoying I would have given a rating of 5 stars.
